name: Rover
quote: Is this the beginning of a new journey? Brimming with novel sounds, and untold stories...
description: A mysterious Resonator with the power to absorb all sounds. Currently journeying to find their lost memories.

vibration-manifestation.name: Vibration Manifestation
vibration-manifestation.description: Basic Attack Rover performs up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing Spectro DMG. Heavy Attack Rover consumes STA to attack the target, dealing Spectro DMG. Heavy Attack: Resonance After Basic Attack 3 or Heavy Attack, press the Basic Attack button at the right time to perform Heavy Attack Resonance, dealing Spectro DMG. Heavy Attack: Aftertune After Heavy Attack Resonance or Dodge Counter hits a target, press the Basic Attack button to perform Heavy Attack Aftertune, dealing Spectro DMG. Mid-air Attack Rover consumes STA to perform a Mid-Air Plunging Attack, dealing Spectro DMG. Dodge Counter Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Spectro DMG.

resonating-slashes.name: Resonating Slashes
resonating-slashes.description: Rover launches an attack forward, dealing Spectro DMG.

echoing-orchestra.name: Echoing Orchestra
echoing-orchestra.description: Rover converges Spectro energy to assail the target area, detonating it after a short delay and dealing Spectro DMG.

reticence.name: Reticence
reticence.description: Damage dealt by Rover's Basic Attack Resonating Echoes is increased by 60%.

silent-listener.name: Silent Listener
silent-listener.description: Rover gains 15% ATK increase for 5s upon casting Heavy Attack Resonance.

waveshock.name: Waveshock
waveshock.description: Rover attacks the target, dealing Spectro DMG.

world-in-a-grain-of-sand.name: World in a Grain of Sand
world-in-a-grain-of-sand.description: Resonance Skill: Resonating Spin If "Diminutive Sound" exceeds 50 when Resonance Skill is used, Rover consumes 50 "Diminutive Sound" to cast Resonating Spin, dealing Spectro DMG, considered as Resonance Skill damage. Basic Attack: Resonating Echoes After Resonance Skill Resonating Spin ends, Rover performs Resonating Echoes upon pressing the Basic Attack button. Launch attacks forward, dealing Spectro DMG, considered as Resonance Skill DMG. Diminutive Sound Rover can hold up to 100 "Diminutive Sounds". Rover obtains "Diminutive Sound" for every Normal Attack Vibration Manifestation on hit. Rover obtains "Diminutive Sound" for every Heavy Attack Aftertune on hit. Rover obtains "Diminutive Sound" upon casting Intro Skill Waveshock.

instant.name: Instant
instant.description: Generate an area of stasis surrounding the next character, lasting for 3s.
